content: As on 31st December, 2021, Sify provides services via 769 fiber nodes and 1,893 wireless base stations across the country, a 6% and 11% increase, respectively, over the same quarter last year. To summarize our business performance, revenue from Data Center colocation services grew by 44% over same quarter last year. The revenue split between the businesses during the quarter was Data Center colocation services at 30%, Digital Services at 24% and Network Centric Services at 46%.
